task.title: Accessing the Adobe Creative Suite (Mac OSX)
task.shortdesc: Adobe makes a lot of software to help creatives (artist, filmakers, etc) create beautiful things. Adobe makes software for video editing, document desgin, photo editing, storyboarding. These are not only beneficial for design oreiented groups, but also for businesses that would like to make chagnes to designs.

taskbody.context: The following states how to access these Adobe applications on Mac OSX.

step.cmd: Go to the applications folder found on the dock on the Mac and click it. A list of items found in the folder come up.
Scroll through the list. The list is in alphabetical order.
Find the Adobe Creative Suite prgrams.
Click on the programs that you need to use for your organization.
